title: Agricultural Economics
overview: This course provides an overview of the position, characteristics, and sustainable development strategies of agriculture within the national economy, with a focus on Vietnam. It covers fundamental theories of agricultural economics, agricultural markets, economic systems, resource utilization, and state management in agriculture and rural areas.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will understand the role, characteristics, and fundamental theories of agricultural economics, as well as market analysis and resource utilization.
Students will be able to apply knowledge and basic skills in analyzing agricultural markets and resource utilization.
Students will be able to solve specific problems in practice through information gathering and planning related to agricultural and rural development.
Students will have a sense of self-discipline, be proactive, enthusiastic, and have a spirit of cooperation and responsibility towards their work.
